title: Product Catalog Browsing
description: As a consumer, I want to browse the product catalog with categorized listings so that I can discover available products from local farmers.
business_value: Enables product discovery, which is the primary path to purchase, directly driving sales and user engagement.

acceptance_criteria.description: Consumer can access product catalog from homepage
Products are displayed in categorized listings
acceptance_criteria.then: Products are organized by category (Vegetables, Fruits, Dairy, etc.)
Each card shows image, name, price, farmer name, and availability

acceptance_criteria.description: Consumer can click product for details
acceptance_criteria.when: Consumer clicks on a product card

acceptance_criteria.then: Seasonal indicators (Spring, Summer, Fall, Winter) are visible

acceptance_criteria.description: Pagination or infinite scroll for large catalogs

technical_notes: Implement lazy loading for product images
Use pagination (20 products per page) or infinite scroll
Support responsive design for mobile browsing

test_cases.title: Consumer accesses product catalog
test_cases.expected_result: Product catalog page is displayed with products

test_cases.title: Product card displays correct information
test_cases.expected_result: Card shows image, name, price, farmer, availability

test_cases.title: Consumer views product details
test_cases.expected_result: Product detail page opens with full information

test_cases.title: Pagination works correctly
steps: Scroll to bottom or click 'Next Page'

test_cases.title: Product images load lazily
test_cases.expected_result: Images load as they enter viewport

test_cases.title: Empty catalog message
preconditions: No products exist or all are out of stock
test_cases.expected_result: Friendly message 'No products available' is displayed
